hero.description: I'm a software developer passionate about Web Technologies and bringing business ideas to life.

about.main: Hello, I'm Rodrigo Moguillansky, an Industrial Engineer and web developer with a background in Supply Chain management. With 8 years of experience in automating processes, constructing and implementing ERP custom software, and optimizing business operations, I bring a distinct perspective to software development. Over the past year and a half, I have dedicated myself to transitioning into web development, focusing on creating impactful solutions for businesses.
expanded: Having experienced firsthand the importance of good quality software in various companies, I am motivated by the opportunity to create intuitive and effective tools that genuinely help businesses streamline their operations and achieve their goals. My goal is to leverage my engineering expertise and web development skills to develop solutions that make a real difference.

I am eager to deepen my knowledge and capabilities to design and architect complete applications from scratch. This ambition drives my daily learning and practice, ensuring I stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of web development.
